observations: The GetPageTemplates API endpoint is returning HTTP 500 Internal Server Error consistently
The error message displayed in UI is: 'There was an error retrieving your content. Please check your internet connection.'
The Templates panel UI loads correctly (heading, search box, Add Template button visible)
Code review shows delete functionality in TemplatesController.cs at DeletePage method (lines 248-268)
Code review shows frontend delete handler in templatesHierarchy.js at _deletePageClickHandler method (lines 276-334)
Code indicates confirmation dialog should appear before deletion using utility.confirm()
Code indicates templates using default skin cannot be deleted (UseDefaultSkin check at line 256-259)
Server-side issue requires investigation - likely database or dependency problem in PageTemplateController.Instance.GetTemplates()
